# Units {.unnumbered}

Conversions:

-   1 gram = 1000 micrograms

-   °F = 9/5(°C) + 32

Unit Abbreviations:

-   mg/L = milligrams per liter

-   μg/L = micrograms per liter

-   CFU/100m = coliform forming units per 100 milliliters

-   μS/cm = microsiemens per centimeter

-   NTU= nephelometric turbidity unit
